name: Floppy Bird: Fly Bird Fly
description:
>> Cuter, better, smarter - The NEW Floppy Bird Game is here!
Flap with your wings and fly through the pipes!

>> 2 Game Modes
- Flappy mode
- Shooter mode

— Unlocks & Gifts
Upgrade birds!

— International Competition
Can you crack the highscore?

— Daily rewards
Unlock special birds within daily raffles!

— Daily challenges
Invite your friends to play and challenge yourself with them.


Inspired by the best mobile casual games we are happy to present Floppy Bird 4.0 to you.
You will love it!

Download Now and Play it
